definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning
butter tea (Tibetan, Mongolian etc drink derived from milk)
butter sculpture (Tibetan art form using paint derived from milk products)

sentences.english: Holidays fried fruit, but also with butter.
sentences.chinese: 逢年过节炸果子，也用酥油。

sentences.english: The Butter Lantern Festival is an important component of Tibetan folk culture.
sentences.chinese: 酥油花灯会是藏民族民俗文化的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Then it flew to the butter-cask and down into the meal-tub and out again.
sentences.chinese: 然后，它飞到了酥油桶又下到吃饭浴缸和出来。

sentences.english: The butter is the fat which in the milk refines, the color and the taste similar edible butter.
sentences.chinese: 酥油是牛奶中提炼出来的脂肪，色与味类似食用黄油。

sentences.english: When milk dries up completely, add pure ghee to stir continuously.
sentences.chinese: 当牛奶基本上快要煮干，加入印度酥油，并搅拌均匀。

sentences.english: Shortening is one of the ingredients in this cake.
sentences.chinese: 起酥油是这个蛋糕的成分之一。

sentences.english: Daniel, don't just drink you buttered tea.
sentences.chinese: 大牛，你别光顾着喝酥油茶。

sentences.english: I'm as good a cook as she is except when it comes to (making) pastry.
sentences.chinese: 我做饭做得和她一样好，就是不会做酥油馅饼。

sentences.english: Tibetan people are most like eating yak butter production.
sentences.chinese: 藏区人民最喜食牦牛产的酥油。

sentences.english: Storing and preparing all different kinds of foodstuffs and cooking down milk and making ghee.
sentences.chinese: 储存和准备各种不同种类的食材并蒸发牛奶和炼酥油。

sentences.english: Melt yak butter in a black clay pan, then add the slices of matsutake.
sentences.chinese: 用黑陶土锅溶化酥油，放上切好的松茸生片。

sentences.english: Please try the milk tea of steppe.
sentences.chinese: 给你尝尝草原上的酥油茶。

sentences.english: Even after telling many times they still put ghee on parathas and sabjis.
sentences.chinese: 说了多少次了，她们还是放很多酥油。

sentences.english: Ambassador and Mrs. Huntsman pause to view a yak butter candle at Ganden Monastery.
sentences.chinese: 洪博培大使及夫人在甘丹寺内驻足观看牦牛酥油蜡烛。

sentences.english: Tibetan butter tea commonly used in hospitality, they drink butter tea, there is a set of rules.
sentences.chinese: 藏族常用酥油茶待客，他们喝酥油茶，还有一套规矩。

sentences.english: Tibetan butter tea commonly used in hospitality, they drink butter tea, there is a set of rules.
sentences.chinese: 藏族常用酥油茶待客，他们喝酥油茶，还有一套规矩。

definition: butter tea (Tibetan, Mongolian etc drink derived from milk)
butter sculpture (Tibetan art form using paint derived from milk products)
highland barley (grown in Tibet and Qinghai)/qingke barley
to stuff one's face/to eat greedily
a kind of a flat bread
